verbose_text: Overall, we have demonstrated in human lens epithelial cells (ARPE19), that MG could increase AGE generation and together with sorbitol could increase the oxidative damage by recruiting inflammatory cytokines like IL-6, IL-8, and MCP-1, and their effects could be counteracted by action of GG which activates the anti-oxidative defense mechanism of SOD and catalase enzymes, and reduces the neuroinflammation in lens epithelial cells of cataract.
